channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2023090876
item.description:
Report X-2023090876

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: ALEXANDRIA
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the hazmat was accidently put on the conveyor belt, it fell off of the belt one of the jugs inside top came off and some of the liquid spilled out. DescribePack: top came off of the gal jug about 3 cups spilled DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: gloves and masks were worn , hazmat moved from the belt into a tote in a well ventilated area
